brief_title: Comparison of Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30 Versus Insulin Glargine in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
brief_summary: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA). The purpose of this study is to test whether Biphasic Insulin Aspart 70/30 twice a day with Metformin improves glycemic control vs. once daily Insulin Glargine with Metformin in subjects with Type 2 Diabetes who are inadequately controlled on basal insulin plus oral anti-diabetic therapy.
